❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ with the fall in full effect it is time to start planning for the holidays it is time to focus on comfort and warmth for your home decor the crochet table runner-free pattern for fall is an easy project that uses beautiful pops of color with brava worsted yarn crochet hook 5 0 mm h furls hook notions yarn needle scissors clover tassel maker yarn wecrochet brava worsted white - 3 skeins fig light green - 1 skein tidepool blue - 1 skein persimmon orange - 1 skein brindle brown - 1 skein yardage approx 725 yards abbreviations/stitches blo- back loop only chain- chain rs- right side single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch sts- stitches ws- wrong side gauge 13 single_crochet sts and 14 row = 4 10 cm with h-hook measurements/sizes length 10 inches 25 cm width 55 inches 140 cm skill level skilled beginner the pattern on the blog the free version of this pattern supported by advertisements can be found on my
